pnTable.name: Master Scanning Mode for One Diamond Table

reference.title: Product Name Standard Document

reference.infoUsed: Scanning Mode for One Diamond Table

reference.title: GRIB 2
reference.infoUsed: GRIB2 Scanning Mode for One Diamond, table 3.10

entry.description: Points scan in +i direction, i.e. from pole to equator.
Points scan in -i direction, i.e. from equator to pole.
Points scan in +j direction, i.e. from west to east.
Points scan in -j direction, i.e. from east to west.
Adjacent points in i direction are consecutive.
Adjacent points in j direction are consecutive
